author: Reuters Editorial
title: Fresenius spokesman says probe into target Akorn continues
text:
FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Fresenius ( FREG.DE ) said on Tuesday its investigation into potential breaches of U.S. Food and Drug Administration data requirements at takeover target Akorn ( AKRX.O ) was ongoing.
Fresenius headquarters in Bad Homburg near Frankfurt, Germany, February 27, 2018. REUTERS/Ralph Orlowski A Fresenius spokesman said that a legal settlement of claims stemming from inaccurate 2014 financial statements by Akorn, announced on Monday, was not related to Freseniusâ€™s own probe, which the company last month warned may result in it calling off the deal.
Reporting by Ludwig Burger; Editing by Arno Schuetze
